privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: Welcome to JidouNavi. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our app.
privacy.section2Intro: We collect the following types of information:
privacy.section2Bullet2: Location data (when you add, visit, or verify vending machines)
privacy.section2Bullet3: Photos you upload of vending machines
privacy.section2Bullet4: Usage data (visits, contributions, badges, upvotes, and machine verifications)
privacy.section2Bullet5: Analytics data (app interactions, feature usage patterns) to improve user experience
privacy.section3Bullet2: Show nearby vending machines on the map
privacy.section3Bullet3: Track your contributions, award badges, and manage leaderboards
privacy.section3Bullet4: Communicate with you about your account
privacy.section3Bullet5: Analyze app usage trends to enhance performance and features
privacy.section4Text: We collect location data only when you explicitly use location-based features (finding nearby machines, adding a new machine, checking in, or verifying machine existence). You can control location permissions through your device settings.
privacy.section5Text: We do not sell your personal data. Your public contributions (machine locations, photos, verifications) are shared with the community to help users discover vending machines. Your email remains private.
privacy.section6Text: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest. Your data is stored securely using Supabase infrastructure.
privacy.section7Bullet3: Request deletion of your account and associated data
privacy.section8Text: If you have questions about this privacy policy or your data, please contact us at: jidou.navi@gmail.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: By using JidouNavi, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the app.
terms.section2Text: JidouNavi is a crowdsourced platform for discovering and sharing vending machine locations. Users can add new machines, check in, verify locations, earn badges, upvote machines, and explore nearby finds.
terms.section3Intro: You must create an account to use most features. You are responsible for:
terms.section3Bullet1: Maintaining the security of your account
terms.section3Bullet2: All activities that occur under your account
terms.section4Intro: When you submit content (photos, locations, descriptions, verifications):
terms.section4Bullet1: Grant us a license to use and display this content
terms.section4Bullet2: Confirm you have the right to share this content
terms.section4Bullet3: Agree not to submit inappropriate or illegal content
terms.section5Bullet2: Harass other users or engage in harmful behavior
terms.section5Bullet3: Attempt to manipulate the badge, leaderboard, or upvote systems
terms.section5Bullet4: Use the app for any illegal purpose
terms.section5Bullet5: Interfere with the proper functioning of the app
terms.section6Text: Vending machine locations are user-contributed and may not always be accurate. We do not guarantee the accuracy of any location data. Machines may be removed, relocated, or out of service.
terms.section7Text: The JidouNavi app, including its design, features, and branding, is owned by us. User-submitted content remains the property of users but is licensed to us for display within the app.
terms.section8Text: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.
terms.section9Text: The app is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service or that the app will be error-free.
terms.section10Text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the app.
terms.section11Text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.section12Text: For questions about these terms, contact us at: jidou.navi@gmail.com
